Reviews.Title: “2 nights in Venice”
Reviews.Author: Elaine H
Reviews.Content: stayed charming little hotel week 2 nights main floor custom europe provide adequate space 2 suitcases looked recently renovated clean comfortable continental breakfast buffet nice cappuchino instead regular coffee hotel close 5 minute walk train station water bus vaparetto convenient enjoyed stay

Reviews.Content: charming elegant hotel minutes walk train station attic price price season venice breakfast forgettable espresso terrible rate hotels breakfast italy continental breakfast usually found outside hotel doors true strada venice cornetti croissants fresh espresso delicious hotel service excellent clean showerbath overall impression positive ac definitely stay
